name: Mazed - 2D Labyrinth Tilt Game
description:
The aim of Mazed is to tilt your iPhone to guide a number (1-3) of balls through a maze to the centre of the maze. You earn medals depending on your speed and you can challenge your friends to see who is the tilt champion of your group!

Features include:

- Addictive and challenging gameplay
- Completely FREE to play (Ads removable by In-App Purchase)
- Earn medals based on your times on each level
- Full Game Center integration
- Race against your friends in 12 different levels

"Pamgaea" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
